subject: Re: [junit] Problem when installation of a la st version “junit4.9b2”!!
msgSnippet: Hi Bodan and everyone, I have fix my CLASSPATH, but the result don’t change…. This installation of Junit doesn’t work, see below:
messageBody:
Hi Bodan and everyone, I have fix my CLASSPATH, but the result don’t change….
This installation of Junit doesn’t work, see below:

llTests

I will be very grateful for you help..
Emanuela

Da: Bogdan Mocanu <bogdan.mocanu.notifications@...>
A: junit@yahoogroups.com
Cc: Emanuela Bertelli <manuspa_72@...>
Inviato: Lun 24 gennaio 2011, 20:49:07
Oggetto: Re: [junit] Problem when installation of a last version “junit4.9b2”!!

Hi Emanuela,

you have a problem in your CLASSPATH, in the name of your JAR file.
You typed "junit4.9b2.jar" but it must be "junit-4.9b2.jar".

Once you fix this in your CLASSPATH variable and restart all the command line
consoles (in case you have any of them opened while you do the fix), you should
be up and running.

Bogdan
